experience.title: Lead Quality Coach
experience.description: - Derived insights based on data analysis to conceptualize initiatives with end to end project management in order to deliver continuous improvement and also breakthroughs.- Created early warning signals to highlight to the Operations and Continuous Improvement teams for timely redressal of potential issues.- Worked closely with Solutions, Design & Implementation team to initiate new projects to improve efficiency - Worked cross functionally with other teams to share root cause analysis and resolve problems.- Accountable for team's work scheduling as well as daily, weekly and monthly targets to be met on time.- Ensured calibration exercises are conducted in a timely manner with clear reporting around variances and action plans to reduce the same.- Identified and communicated trends in defects found, collaborated with operations and CI teams to find solutions and process improvement to reduce defects.- Ensured best practices are shared across teams and also worked with the Learning team to improve training modules and content accordingly.- Trained other Quality Coaches in my team for performing their responsibilities end to end.- Managed a team in the monitoring function - Provided adequate guidance and support to the team through supervision & coaching, 1-1 coaching wherever required.- Ensured adherence to ethics & compliance and company's policies by the team.
experience.description_html: - Derived insights based on data analysis to conceptualize initiatives with end to end project management in order to deliver continuous improvement and also breakthroughs.- Created early warning signals to highlight to the Operations and Continuous Improvement teams for timely redressal of potential issues.- Worked closely with Solutions, Design & Implementation team to initiate new projects to improve efficiency - Worked cross functionally with other teams to share root cause analysis and resolve problems.- Accountable for team's work scheduling as well as daily, weekly and monthly targets to be met on time.- Ensured calibration exercises are conducted in a timely manner with clear reporting around variances and action plans to reduce the same.- Identified and communicated trends in defects found, collaborated with operations and CI teams to find solutions and process improvement to reduce defects.- Ensured best practices are shared across teams and also worked with the Learning team to improve training modules and content accordingly.- Trained other Quality Coaches in my team for performing their responsibilities end to end.- Managed a team in the monitoring function - Provided adequate guidance and support to the team through supervision & coaching, 1-1 coaching wherever required.- Ensured adherence to ethics & compliance and company's policies by the team.

experience.title: SME (Subject Matter Expert)
experience.description: Worked Directly with Vodafone UK client, as Customer Service adviser in handling Billing and Technical Support. Also won larger roles with additional responsibilities like providing support for nesting batches, process training and soft skills training. Played a key role as Newco Superuser during the transition of Accounts from CRM to Siebel.
